result.eng: I have tried the new search engine.
result.ga: Bhain mé triail as an inneall cuardaigh nua
result.orig: Bhain mé triail as an inneall cuardaigh nua
result.html: Bhain mé triail as an inneall cuardaigh nuaI have tried the new search engine.
result.ponchtml: Ḃain mé triail as an inneall cuardaiġ nuaI have tried the new search engine.

result.eng: The engine is supposed to be working.
result.ga: Tá an t-inneall in ainm is a bheith ag obair
result.orig: Tá an t-inneall in ainm is a bheith ag obair
result.html: Tá an t-inneall in ainm is a bheith ag obairThe engine is supposed to be working.
result.ponchtml: Tá an t-inneall in ainm is a ḃeiṫ ag obairThe engine is supposed to be working.
